      private Card Hand.firstHand(Game game, Trick trick)
      If the current size of the trick is zero (you are the first hand), play highest card in your shortest suit, but if this suit is a void let index equal the lowest card in any suit (the lowest of all)

      private Card Hand.lastHand(Game game, Trick trick)
      If the current size of the trick is one less than the total number of players (you are the last hand), and if the trick does not have the queen of spades or any hearts, pay the highest card to try to win.
      private Card Hand.middleHand(Game game, Trick trick)
      Play a slight low than the winning card.
